Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the web application, including notification types, target platforms, and expected user base.
Define the notification strategy, including message formats, delivery methods, and user segmentation.
Set up a new Notification Hub in the Azure portal, specifying the namespace and hub name.
Configure platform-specific settings for push notifications, such as Firebase for Android or APNs for iOS.

Tasks.Task: Integrate Notification Hub with Web Application
Tasks.Task Description: Integrate the Notification Hub with the web application using the appropriate SDKs or REST APIs.
Secure the Notification Hub by configuring access policies, Shared Access Signatures (SAS), and encryption for sensitive data.
Send test notifications to ensure proper delivery and formatting across all target platforms.
Set up monitoring and alerts for notification delivery status, failures, and performance metrics using Azure Monitor.
Document the Notification Hub setup, integration steps, and operational procedures for future reference.
Ensure the Notification Hub setup complies with relevant regulations and implement regular auditing procedures.
